abstract: Mark Hurd will bring operational expertise to Oracle, as well as inside knowledge of its rival Hewlett-Packard.
snippet: Mark Hurd will bring operational expertise to Oracle, as well as inside knowledge of its rival Hewlett-Packard.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Ellison, chief executive of Oracle, has begun another phase of his battle with Silicon Valley. Mr. Ellison, an admirer of Sun Tzu, the ancient Chinese general credited with writing “The Art of War,” mocked the board of his rival Hewlett-Packard when it forced out Mark Hurd as chief executive last month. By now hiring Mr. Hurd, Mr. Ellison has backed up his words. He not only gains a well-regarded operations guru, he follows Sun’s dictum: “Know your enemy.”

headline.main: A New Lieutenant for Ellison’s War
headline.print_headline: A New Lieutenant For Ellison's War

byline.original: By Robert Cyran and George Hay
